msbt.message: dummy
Hiya!<10_7 arg="45" />Thanks for callin'. This is the Rescue Service hotline.
One sec, you are<10_7 arg="30" />
Your current location is<10_7 arg="30" />
Ah, for cryin' out loud! I can't make heads or tails of this signal. Looks like my kid brother's handwriting

Listen, palyou got a visitor? Somebody pop over to shoot the breeze? Pick fruit or whatnot?Let me spell it out. Too many signals, and the system don't work right. Like Sonny after too much javaIf ya got yourself an emergency, open the  Button menu and pick End Session, will ya?

Oh, I think I see what's wrong. You doin' some sightseein'? Visiting somebody else's island, maybe? Lemme tell you about me. I like it simple. Too many signals zippin' around makes thingsless simple.If you really need help, you gotta go choose Return to my island on the  Button menu, capisce?

Stop. You ain't even outside, are ya?Here's the deal, pal. This service don't work if you're indoors.It ain't rocket science. I can't come grab you if I got rafters and beams in the way. I ain't a miracle worker!So, ya want my help, I'm gonna need ya to step outside, OK?
Here we go! This is from , right?
Let's see Ah! on , right? Nice to hear from ya.
Hang on Oh, . You in hot water AGAIN?
Here we go! This is from , right?
Let's see Ah! on , right? Nice to hear from ya.
Pretty basic system here—rescues go for 100 miles. You in?
Yes! Help!
No, thanks.
It's 100 miles per rescue. Whaddaya say?
Yes! Help!
No, thanks.
You know, . You were short on miles last time you called. Hope you got that sortedFee's 100 miles. You in?
Yes! Help!
No, thanks.
What, seriously?
Huh? No deal? Hey, listen No one cares if you were short on miles before. Not an issue—capisce?
If you're in a jam, just say the word!
You really need help? Let's be clearI don't care if you got Nook Miles or not.If you're in a tough spot, I'm your mole. Got it?
Nice! <10_4 />OK, let's make it official. Show me the 100 miles.
There ya go. <10_4 />And since you're all set with your 100 miles this time, I'll just take 'em up front!
Smart kid! It's 100 miles, so let's get that squared away<10_7 arg="75" />

<10_10 /> WAIT A MINUTE!<10_9 />What're you tryin' to pull here? You're a little short on miles, there.Hmph. Guess I just leave you there<10_4 /> Eh, just kiddin'! What kinda mole'd do that? This one's on the house!
<10_10 /> WAHHH!<10_9 />You gotta be kiddin' me! You're short on miles again, bright eyes?Poached earthworms! What a day Eh, don't worry none. I ain't gonna leave ya hanging. This one's on me.
But since I'm doin' you a favor, I choose where to drop ya. No negotiatin'.
One more thing. Since you're not traveling alone, I gotta send ya to the plaza. Regs, you know?
Now that that's settled, where can I take ya?
Home.
The plaza.
The airport.
Cancel.
Now that that's settled, where can I take ya?
My tent.
The plaza.
The airport.
Cancel.
Now that that's settled, where can I take ya?
Home.
The plaza.
The shop.
The airport.
Cancel.
OK, pal. Here's the deal. You haven't settled on a place to live yetSo that means I don't know where to drop ya. Wanna give me a hint?
The plaza.
The airport.
Cancel.
OK, pal. Here's the deal. You haven't settled on a place to live yetSo that means I don't know where to drop ya. Wanna give me a hint?
The plaza.
The shop.
The airport.
Cancel.
Now that that's settled, where can I send ya?
My tent.
The plaza.
The shop.
The airport.
Cancel.
Huh? You there, champ? I see you been doin' some sightseeing, right?Problem is, I can't get map data for that island. So I'm gonna have to drop you where the planes land. That work for you?
Guess it'll have to!
Cancel.
Huh? Hey there, champ. Looks like you're on one of them May Day Tours Tom Nook set up.And ya got yourself a Mayday-type situation! Regs say I gotta reset and drop ya where the planes land OK?
Yes, please!
Cancel.
Huh? Hey there, champ. Looks like you're on one of them May Day Tours Tom Nook set up.Regs say I gotta reset and drop ya where the planes land. So buckle up!
This is weird. 'Scuse me, champ. You're a bit off the grid, ain't ya? Hard to pinpoint your location Huh. Looks like I'll have to drop ya at the nearest plaza to be safe. You OK with that?
Yes, please!
Cancel.
Thanks for the confirmation. I'll go ahead and drop ya off at the plaza on the you're on.And since regs are dictating your destination, there's no charge. Save those miles for a rainy day!
Your tent? Sure thing.
Home sweet home? You got it, boss.
The plaza? No prob.
The island shop? Piece of mud pie.
You got it! Ready, set, goooooooooo!
The airport, huh? You got it, pal.
What am I workin' with here? Guess I press this doohickey
Easy does it, Don Pick a button. What's the worst that happens?
I'm a Resetti. I got this Can I make the font bigger?
Sure. Let's roll the dice.
Here goes nothin'!<10_8 arg="30" />
Open your eyes, kid! Trip's over!
Oh yeah. One last thing
So I'm a big fan of, you know, language. Think about it a lot. Even wrote some alphabet fanfiction. Spoiler—the letter "I" MIGHT be based on a certain ruggedly handsome mole. Wink, wink.

Ya know how people say "I could care less" when what they really mean is that they COULDN'T care less?You know, 'cause their care tank's empty? That bugs me. But I'm doin' yoga 'n stuff. Tryin' to get centered.

This cousin of mine always says "it takes two to tangle" instead of "two to tango."I've tried correctin' him, but it's no good. Doesn't know a thing about dancin' OR math. He also says "hit the snail on the head," but I think that's on purpose. Kid loves a game of Smack the Snail.
So I'm a big fan of, you know, language. Think about it a lot. Even wrote some alphabet fanfiction. Spoiler—the letter "I" MIGHT be based on a certain ruggedly handsome mole. Wink, wink.

Ya know how people say "I could care less" when what they really mean is that they COULDN'T care less?You know, 'cause their care tank's empty? That bugs me. But I'm doin' yoga 'n stuff. Tryin' to get centered.
You're using the Nook Stop in Resident Services every day to earn miles, right? That's, like, the basics.
Usin' the Rescue Service for free left and right Who d'ya think you are, pal?!Bah. It's a free lunch, but ya get what ya pay for!

Heh. Somethin' seem different? I figured you'd notice.Yeah, you're one sharp cookie, .Here's the skinny. Resethe, uh, service operator is sorta on a break right now.I'm stepping in for him. Think of me as a substitute teacher, if ya like.I ain't what you'd call a high-society mole, so sorry if I'm a bit, uh, rough around the edges. Now then, ahem
